<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> a3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
__________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets given channel as current chat channel. Scripted way of selecting desired channel on the UI. The given channel may be disabled (see [[enableChannel]]), this is why this command returns boolean, [[true]] on success or [[false]] on failure. 
{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable" style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center"
! colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"16" <template><title>!</title></template> [[Channel IDs|channel ID]] number correspondence
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Global

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Command

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom3
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom4

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom6

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom9
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom10

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 10

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>} 
For Custom Radio (see [[radioChannelCreate]])
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setCurrentChannel''' channelID </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> channelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|channel ID]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] on success </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isDirectSelected = [[setCurrentChannel]] 5; // sets Direct channel as current active</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[getPlayerChannel]], [[currentChannel]], [[enableChannel]], [[channelEnabled]], [[radioChannelCreate]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 9, 2015 - 16:45 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command can be used together with custom radio channels, but an offset of 5 must be added to the index from radioChannelCreate.
<code>_index = [[radioChannelCreate]] [[1, 0, 0, 1], "Custom Channel 1", "%UNIT_NAME", [player]];
[[setCurrentChannel]] (_index + 5);
</code>
</dd>
</dl>

</comment>

<dd class="note">
